about.description:
A fork of CBRE by AestheticalZ that adds new QOL features.

Licensed under the GPL v2.0. All of the other components are licensed under the LGPL v2.1 unless otherwise stated. Editor sidebar icons are licensed under BSD-3.

Based on Sledge by Daniel Walder
logic-and-trick.com
The original CBRE is a fork of Sledge
created by juanjp600.
info.title: Information
info.editor.title:
Containment Breach Room Editor - Extended
"omgggg it doesnt have model baking it sucks as much as the original cbre :((((("
info.canceled: The operation was canceled by the user.
warning.title: Warning!
warning.document.unknown_entity:
CBRE-EX has found some unknown entities in this map file.
They will not be exported, and they will appear as a small colored cube in the 3D viewport.
Please, ask the creator of this map for the appropriate JSON files for this map.
warning.export.performance:
Baking model shadows will SEVERELY impact lightmapping performance, especially if there are lots of models in your room.
It's recommended to leave it off unless you're exporting the room.

Are you sure you want to continue?

This warning can be turned off in Settings.
warning.editor.update_manually:
There is a new update available, but the required files are missing. This may mean that you need to update CBRE-EX manually.

Do you want to open the latest GitHub release?
updater.title: CBRE-EX Updater
updater.header:

Would you like to download and install it?

layout.help:
Each rectangle represents a viewport.
Click and drag rectangles (click start, drag to end) to combine viewports.
Click a combined viewport to un-combine it.

hotkey.snap_selection_to_grid_individual: Snap each selected object to the grid based on their individual bounding boxes

hotkey.rotate_selection_counter_clockwis: Rotate the selected objects 90 degrees counter-clockwise

hotkey.center_3d_view_on_selection.descr: Center the 3D viewport on the current selection

hotkey.move_to_world.description: Move the selected entities to the world

hotkey.texture_tool.description: Switch to the texture application tool

hotkey.apply_texture.description: Apply the current texture to the selection.

hotkey.vertex_manipulation.face_edit.des: Switch to the face edit mode while in the VM tool.

document.save_change: Would you like to save your changes to this map?
document.save_change_2: Would you like to save your changes to {0}?
document.hollow_out: This will hollow out every selected solid, are you sure?
document.existing_entity.proceed: You have selected an existing entity (a '{0}'), how would you like to proceed?
document.existing_entity.keep_exist: - Keep the existing entity and add the selected items to the entity
document.existing_entity.create_new: - Create a new entity and add the selected items to the new entity
document.entities_selected.keep: You have selected multiple entities, which one would you like to keep?
document.no_solid_entities: No solid entities found. Please make sure your FGDs are configured correctly.
document.duplicate_id: Multiple faces have the same ID
document.duplicate_id.description: More than one face was found with the same ID. Each face ID should be unique. Fixing this problem will assign the duplicated faces a new ID.
document.duplicate_key.description: This entity has the same key specified multiple times. Entity keys should be unique. Fixing the problem will remove the duplicate key.
document.duplicate_object: Multiple objects have the same ID
document.duplicate_object.description: More than one object has the same ID. Each object ID should be unique. Fixing the problem will assign the duplicates new IDs.
document.empty_group.description: This group is empty. A group must have contents. Fixing the problem will delete the group.
document.invalid_solid.description: This solid is invalid. It is either not convex, has coplanar faces, or has off-plane vertices. Fixing the issue will delete the solid.
document.point_entity_children.descripti: A point entity with children was found. A point entity cannot have any contents. Fixing the issue will move the children outside of the entity's group.
document.brush_entity_children.descripti: A brush entity with child entities was found. A brush entity must only have solid contents. Fixing the problem will move the child entities outside of the entity's group.
document.brush_entity_no_solid: Brush entity has no solid children
document.brush_entity_no_solid.descripti: A brush entity with no solid children was found. A brush entity must have solid contents. Fixing the problem will delete the entity.
document.solid_children.description: A solid with children was found. A solid cannot have any contents. Fixing the issue will move the children outside of the solid's group.
document.entity_no_match: Entity target has no matching named entity
document.entity_no_match.description: This entity's target value doesn't have an matching named entity. Each target should have a matching target name. Fixing the problem will reset the target's value to a blank string.
document.texture_axis_face.description: The texture axis of this face is perpendicular to the face plane. This occurs when manipulating objects with texture lock off, as well as various other operations. Re-align the texture to the face to repair. Fixing the problem will reset the textures to the face plane.
document.texture_not_found.description: This texture was not found in the currently loaded texture folders. Ensure that the correct texture folders are loaded. Fixing the problems will reset the face textures to the default texture.
data.noshadow: Disables shadow casting for this brush.
tool.vertex_manipulation.help: Select a VM mode for more information
tool.standard.help:
*Click* a vertex to select all points under the cursor.
 - Hold *control* to select multiple points.
 - Hold *shift* to only select the topmost point.
Drag vertices to move them around.

Select two (non-adjacent) points on a face to enable splitting.
tool.scale_distance.help:
*Click* a vertex to select all points under the cursor.
 - Hold *control* to select multiple points.
 - Hold *shift* to only select the topmost point.
Move the origin point around by *clicking and dragging* it.
tool.face.help:
*Click* a face in the 3D view to select it.
Hold *control* to select multiple faces.
tool.select.help:
*Click* to select an object.
In the 3D view, *click and hold* and use the *mouse wheel* to cycle through objects behind the cursor.
In the 2D view, *click the selection box* to cycle between manipulation modes.
tool.vm.undo: Please exit the VM tool to undo any changes.
tool.texture.help:
*Click* a face to select it
*Ctrl+Click* to select multiple
*Shift+Click* to select all faces of a solid
tool.texture.right_click.help:
Right Click Shortcuts:
Shift: Apply texture to all faces on a brush
Alt: Apply texture with alignment to last selected face
Shift+Alt: Apply with alignment to all faces on a brush
tool.texture.left_click.help:
Left Click Shortcuts:
Shift: Select all faces on a brush
Ctrl: Select multiple faces
Shift+Ctrl: Invert selected faces on brush
tool.camera.help:
*Click* the camera origin or direction arrow to move the camera.
Hold *shift* and *click* to create multiple cameras.
Press *Tab* to cycle between cameras
tool.clip.help:
*Click* and drag to define the clipping plane.
*Click* and drag any of the three points to change the orientation of the plane.
Press *enter* to cut the selected solids along the clipping plane.
tool.entity.help:
In the 3D view, *click* a face to place an entity there.
In the 2D view, *click* to place a point and press *enter* to create.
*Right click* in the 2D view to quickly choose and create any entity type.
tool.sketch.help:
*Click* a face to start sketching the base of the brush.
*Click* again to choose the height of the brush.
*Click* a third time to create the brush.
*Right click* at any time to go back one step.
tool.brush.help:
Draw a box in the 2D view to define the size of the brush.
Select the type of the brush to create in the sidebar.
Press *enter* in the 2D view to create the brush.
